sources.title: The Timid Rabbit (1937)
sources.description: A rabbit is shy and cowardly around his girlfriend. When a wolf shows up and terrorizes the woodland creatures, he suddenly turns into a fearless hero and punches out the villain. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-timid-rabbit-1937/

metadata.Plot: A rabbit is shy and cowardly around his girlfriend. When a wolf shows up and terrorizes the woodland creatures, he suddenly turns into a fearless hero and punches out the villain.
metadata.Writer: John Foster, Tom Morrison, Paul Terry
